Recollections of Wallace
Hawarden Park, Hawarden, Flintshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £25 and shield, 2nd £12.10s., 3rd £7.10s. March contest(own choice) - 1st(£2)Penketh Tannery, 2nd(£1)Abram Colliery, 3rd (10s.) Aigburth Silver. 7 bands competed
